changelog_html:
1.0.3 - 2026-01-01

  • Fix: Event data display issue in logs (stripslashes conflict)

1.0.2 - 2026-01-01

  • Refactor: Separated Admin UI into dedicated class for better architecture
  • Fix: Security hardening for AJAX endpoints (nonce verification, rate limiting)
  • Fix: JSON handling in event logging
  • Fix: Fatal error with undefined get_settings method

1.0.1 - 2026-01-01

  • Fix: All event triggers now properly check conditions before firing
  • Fix: pageload, time, scroll, click, video, and form events respect conditions
  • Fix: social_visitor and similar conditional events no longer fire incorrectly

1.0.0 - 2026-01-01

  • Initial release
description: Manage and track GA4 events with an easy-to-use WordPress admin interface. Features include conditional event triggers, Cookiebot consent integration, and comprehensive event logging.
